content: FS-ONE MAX Firestop intumescent sealant High-performance intumescent firestop sealant ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features For effectively sealing most common through penetrations in a variety of base materials – including concrete, masonry and drywall For use in all types of pipe penetrations – metal pipes, insulated metal pipes and plastic pipes For use in most types of cable penetrations – single cables, cable bundles, cable trays and mixed Versatile – one product for most firestop applications Applications Metal pipe penetrations – copper, steel and EMT Insulated metal pipe penetrations – steel and copper Plastic pipe penetrations – closed or vented Single cables and cable bundles Cable trays and combi openings For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: UL Green Guard Gold: Yes LEED VOC: 9 g/l Base materials: Concrete, Metal, Wood, Drywall Technical Data | LEED VOC | 9 g/l | UL Green Guard Gold | Yes | Base materials | Concrete, Metal, Wood, Drywall | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Approx. cure time | 2 mm/3 days | 1 | Can be painted | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate | Color | Red | at 75°F/24°C, 50% relative humidity ### ITEMS- 2101531 - FS-ONE MAX 10.1oz cartridge - Package Size 1 pc - 3530249 - FS-ONE MAX 10oz tube (1 case) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x FS-ONE MAX 10.1oz cartridge - 3534412 - FS-ONE MAX 10 oz Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1008x FS-ONE MAX 10.1oz cartridge - 3530250 - FS-ONE MAX 20oz foil (1 case) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x FSONE-MAX 20 oz foil - 3530251 - FS-ONE MAX 20oz foil (3 case) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 75x FSONE-MAX 20 oz foil - 3530252 - FS-ONE MAX 20oz foil (3 case + disp) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack dispenser manual CS 270-P1 - 75x FSONE-MAX 20 oz foil - 3534713 - FS-ONE MAX 20oz Foil-Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 600x FSONE-MAX 20 oz foil - 3849910 - FSOne Max Foil Pallet w/Nuron Disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CD 4-22 Cordl. dispenser - 1x Barrel CD 4 long assembly set - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 600x FSONE-MAX 20 oz foil - 1x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack - 2101533 - FSONE-MAX 5 gallon pail - Package Size 1 pc - 3530263 - FS-ONE MAX 5 gallon (18 pails) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x FSONE-MAX 5 gallon pail
